relation: The food is good but i dont eat here because its too expensive for me.
i wouldnt know. I dont live in the dorms.
When you dont understand something, it is extremely important you get help. Teachers will be happy to help

College is not just about drinking and partying. Theres A LOT of studying involved. If you dont understand something go to tutoring! Dont think you will magically pass all your classes. Its not highschool anymore, youre teachers will not be behind you telling you what you are missing. You have to be on top of things on your own.
Reedley college is great! You have all the help and guidance you need. Teachers are very helpful; you can definitely be successful here.

textAfterTable: Comments What to do for fun trails walks, events, farm, and sourndings with beautiful nature. Food and Dining the food is well prepare . Dorm Life i have not has a dorm life experience.but the dorms just got remodel.look great. Academic Rigor well educated instructor. Tips for prospective students ask question and get to know the instructors.always keep your mind set of things positive way. do not procrastinate and keep a routine that helps you through in learning .one important thing is to challenge your self, set goals. In three sentences helpful and beneficial programs for student. an accredited program by the naeyc child development center in which gives an opportunity for labs in the highest quality for feature early childhood teachers. great instructors.
